name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】DISASTERSHOW ｜｜ Disasterpiece Release Mini Show! ｜｜ Mori Calliope #disastershow #calliolive [fuQ7VpAVFr4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Mori Calliope performing 'Disasterpiece' on a 3D stage with a desert sunset background.
Instrumental transition. The stage lights dim and Mori Calliope prepares for the MC segment.
MC segment where Mori Calliope addresses the audience, mentions technical difficulties, and thanks guests.

subtitles.original: Thank you for coming today everyone, it's over!
subtitles.english: Thank you for coming today everyone, it's over!

subtitles.original: It's okay, no, no, no, we're back, we're back.
subtitles.english: It's okay, no, no, no, we're back, we're back.

subtitles.original: Just some technical difficulties.
subtitles.english: Just some technical difficulties.

subtitles.original: Staff-san, the beats!
subtitles.english: Staff-san, the beats!

subtitles.original: Everyone calm down, it's fine, it's fine, we're okay.
subtitles.english: Everyone calm down, it's fine, it's fine, we're okay.

subtitles.original: Welcome, welcome!
subtitles.english: Welcome, welcome!

subtitles.original: Hey, you know what? It fits in the theme of the show
subtitles.english: Hey, you know what? It fits in the theme of the show

subtitles.original: that there'd be some technical issues.
subtitles.english: that there'd be some technical issues.

subtitles.original: So it can't be perfect, right?
subtitles.english: So it can't be perfect, right?

subtitles.original: But I'm looking at your comments right now
subtitles.english: But I'm looking at your comments right now

subtitles.original: and thank you by the way to Shiori for the raid as well.
subtitles.english: and thank you by the way to Shiori for the raid as well.

subtitles.original: Hope the outfit reveal went super good.
subtitles.english: Hope the outfit reveal went super good.

subtitles.original: Hi Dead Beats! Hello!
subtitles.english: Hi Dead Beats! Hello!

subtitles.original: We're here, we're here!
subtitles.english: We're here, we're here!

subtitles.original: We're finally at the Disasterpiece venue.
subtitles.english: We're finally at the Disasterpiece venue.

subtitles.original: And I'm reading your comments, but there might be a little bit of lag,
subtitles.english: And I'm reading your comments, but there might be a little bit of lag,

subtitles.original: so sorry about that.
subtitles.english: so sorry about that.

subtitles.original: Anyway, check it out. I've got a special,
subtitles.english: Anyway, check it out. I've got a special,

subtitles.original: I've got my own special mic
subtitles.english: I've got my own special mic

subtitles.original: that is definitely what I'm using to talk and not the headset.
subtitles.english: that is definitely what I'm using to talk and not the headset.

subtitles.original: But check it out!
subtitles.english: But check it out!

subtitles.original: Oh, I'll show it to you closer later.
subtitles.english: Oh, I'll show it to you closer later.

subtitles.original: I've got... oh, hello! Liz is here too!
subtitles.english: I've got... oh, hello! Liz is here too!

subtitles.original: Amazing Senpai, woo! Thank you.
subtitles.english: Amazing Senpai, woo! Thank you.

subtitles.original: Welcome to Disaster Show everyone.
subtitles.english: Welcome to Disaster Show everyone.

subtitles.original: Disasterpiece is out at long last!
subtitles.english: Disasterpiece is out at long last!

subtitles.original: Hooray! We did it! We finally got here.
subtitles.english: Hooray! We did it! We finally got here.

subtitles.original: And now, I'm gonna do some songs for you guys.
subtitles.english: And now, I'm gonna do some songs for you guys.

subtitles.original: Whoa, Akaspa... I can't read it right now,
subtitles.english: Whoa, Akaspa... I can't read it right now.

subtitles.original: but I'll have to read them later. Thank you so much.
subtitles.english: but I'll have to read them later. Thank you so much.

subtitles.original: The new art style is so nice?
subtitles.english: The new art style is so nice?

subtitles.original: This is some unreal power, Dead Beats, unreal power.
subtitles.english: This is some unreal power, Dead Beats, unreal power.

subtitles.original: It's stunning, isn't it?
subtitles.english: It's stunning, isn't it?

subtitles.original: I bet you want to get a closer look
subtitles.english: I bet you want to get a closer look

subtitles.original: and maybe get some screenshots of Mori Calliope's face.
subtitles.english: and maybe get some screenshots of Mori Calliope's face.

subtitles.english: So let me show you, Staff-san is holding a special camera.
